description: Java Spring MVC controller class for managing Owner entities in the PetClinic application, including creation, update, search, and display functionalities.

classes.name: OwnerController
classes.description: Spring MVC controller handling owner-related web requests, including creation, editing, searching, and viewing owner details.

methods.name: setAllowedFields
methods.description: Configures WebDataBinder to disallow binding of the 'id' field.

methods.name: findOwner
methods.description: Retrieves an Owner by ID or returns a new Owner if ID is null.

methods.name: initCreationForm
methods.description: Initializes the form for creating a new owner.

methods.name: processCreationForm
methods.description: Processes the submission of the new owner creation form.

methods.name: processFindForm
methods.description: Handles owner search requests with pagination and redirects.

methods.name: addPaginationModel
methods.description: Adds pagination data to the model for owner list display.

methods.name: findPaginatedForOwnersLastName
methods.description: Performs paginated search for owners by last name.

methods.name: initUpdateOwnerForm
methods.description: Initializes the form for updating an owner.

methods.name: processUpdateOwnerForm
methods.description: Processes the owner update form submission.

methods.name: showOwner
methods.description: Displays detailed information for a specific owner.
